short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple plugin for download Lemon8`s image and video.
short.zh_CN: 一个简单的插件，用于下载Lemon8的图像和视频。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Video Lemon8 plug-in can help users download videos and pictures on the Lemon8 web page, and can support setting whether to ask for the download location and whether to download multiple pictures.

Instructions for use 🛠️
1. Install plugin 📥: In the browser, click the plug-in store, search for "Download Video Lemon8", and click install.
2. Use function 🚀: Open the web version of Lemon8 (https://www.lemon8-app.com/feed/foryou), click to enter a post details page, and click the (Download/Download) button in the lower right corner of the picture or video. , just download it directly. You can also click the plug-in icon in the upper right corner to set the plug-in configuration.

Download Video Lemon8 Save your favorite pictures and videos locally!

Disclaimer: The Download Video Lemon8 plug-in is not an official plug-in. The product is an independent project of Download Video Lemon8. Little Red Book™ is Little Red Book Inc. Trademark, Download Video Lemon8 and Little Red Book™ or Little Red Book Inc. It has nothing to do with it.
